If a CALM recipient who has been discontinued from Medi-Cal decides to appeal that action, and continues to receive Medi-Cal benefits pending that appeal, that individual shall also continue to receive CALM payments pending the final administrative decision regarding discontinuance of Medi-Cal benefits. If the discontinuance from Medi-Cal is upheld, the Department may not collect any CALM payments pending, unless ineligibility for Medi-Cal is due to fraud. 
(Added by Ord. 149-98, App. 5/8/98)
